siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

markdownRemark.excerpt: Dear Listener, Today we do a mid-year-ish check in on our goals for 2021 that we set back in Episode 115: Headed into a New Year. Overall we’re doing okay on…
markdownRemark.html:
Dear Listener,

Today we do a mid-year-ish check in on our goals for 2021 that we set back in Episode 115: Headed into a New Year.

Overall we’re doing okay on our goals. Hopefully only to improve as the year continues.

Stan Lemon & Jon Kohlmeier

frontmatter.title: Ted Lasso, Milkshakes, and Irrigation Systems
'Cause you're invited to a BBQ that's starting at 4
